chapter.title: CIPSO Labeled Networking
chapter.para: This lab will show you how to set up CIPSO labeled networking with SSH. When using an SSH server that requires CIPSO labeled networking, both the client and server must have this set up. This means that anyone without CIPSO labeled networking will be unable to log in to a CIPSO enabled MLS SSH connection.
